description: Connect to your Supabase project to explore and query your database. List tables, inspect schemas, and execute queries to get answers fast. Check connection status and streamline everyday data tasks from one place.

capabilities.name: check_connection
capabilities.description: Check the connection status to Supabase

capabilities.name: list_tables
capabilities.description: List all tables in the database

capabilities.name: query_database
capabilities.description: Execute a database query on Supabase tables

capabilities.name: get_table_schema
capabilities.description: Get the schema information for a specific table
